title: APA 7
text: What's new in APA 7th Edition Student & Professional Research Papers – You can now create two different types of research papers (as well as discussion posts). Brand new reference & citation engine – Create every type of 7th Edition reference with perfect citations with our streamlined Reference Wizard & Auto-fill feature. Revised paper elements – Headings, Abstracts, Tables, and Figures all received updates to make them work better for digital reading.
